original_text: As we passed to the lee of a small island called Cauda, we were hardly able to make the lifeboat secure,
korean_text: 가우다라는 작은 섬 아래로 지나 간신히 거루를 잡아

sentences.original_text: As we passed to the lee of a small island
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 작은 섬의 바람이 잔잔한 곳으로 지나갈 때

sentences.original_text: we were hardly able to make the lifeboat secure
